conversations.summary: Today was a mixed bag. I had a frustrating moment with my dog, Peach, who wouldn't stop bugging me to go out even though I had just taken her. I think she might be drinking too much water because her poop looked a little hard.  On a positive note, my boss was really nice and changed my schedule for tomorrow so I could go in at my usual time.
